about_the_game:
Welcome to the Bramble Royale - the great tournament in all of Meteorfall - where the likes of sozzled bearbearians and nuke-addled snotwolves battle it out for a chance to win the legendary Mask of the Uberlich. Win over legions of fans and help fill Bramble’s pockets as he seeks to rebuild his once-mighty arena.




Play cards, maneuver your allies, and brawl in fast-paced battles.

Winning the Bramble Royale isn't about fighting fair - it's about winning. The crowd demands spectacle! Take advantage of Wild Cards to change the rules of the brawl, exploiting them to your advantage.

  • Mix-and-match multiple upgrades on a single card to build overpowered combos
  • Impress the crowd and power-up in battle by completing challenging feats
  • Build your dream team of 3 heroes (from a pool of 8), each with their own unique set of cards
  • Discover more than 200 cards to turn the tides of battle in your favor




Poor, sad Bramble. One night, in a fit of idiocy, he gambled away the rights to his coliseum in a seedy saloon at the far reaches of Meteorfall.

While moping around the wastelands the next morning, he happened upon a mask that once belonged to the villainous Uberlich himself. The gears began to turn (albeit slowly) in that grizzled brown head of his. Some time later, a very rare stroke of genius befell him: he could offer the Mask of the Uberlich as the ultimate prize in a new tournament, attract the greatest heroes and deepest-pocketed fans, and rebuild his mighty Arena!

And thus, that fateful tournament, dubbed “The Bramble Royale” was first conceived. However, as Bramble later realized - sometimes when you hit rock bottom, life hands you a shovel.


Between bouts in the arena, you'll take a break in Bramble Town, where you'll have an opportunity to upgrade your cards, train your heroes, or just enjoy the sights. There's not enough time between brawls to do it all, so you'll have to make critical decisions about which vendors you want to visit.




Deckbuilders sometimes take too long and don't always respect your time. Bramble Royale has been designed from the ground up to be not just deep and challenging, but also quick to play.

  • Average run length of 45 minutes or less
  • Unlockable content that expands tactical options without power creep
  • Full content unlock option available in Settings




Bramble Royale is the third game in the Meteorfall series. The first was Meteorfall (2017) followed by Krumit's Tale (2019). You don't need to play other games in the series to enjoy Bramble Royale. Each game has very different mechanics, but take place in the same universe and have many of the same characters.

Despite the mechnical differences, Bramble Royale carries on the series tradition with a common theme of card-based combat, wacky characters and a roguelike gameplay loop.

name: Bramble Royale: A Meteorfall Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb Video Memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Bramble Royale is a wild, no-holds barred card brawl in the wacky world of Meteorfall. Build a face-melting deck, break the rules, and stomp your opponents in this fast-paced & fresh take on roguelike deckbuilders.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
